data.title: DIRECTV Transponder Map ~ Data 8/14/2024
data.meta_description:
We might see something like this on the TV Promise page now:

DIRECTV, DIRECTV STREAM, and U-verse will continue to provide live coverage of MLB Arizona...
data.text:

Roanoke, VA

Jul 18, 2023

#481

We might see something like this on the TV Promise page now:

DIRECTV, DIRECTV STREAM, and U-verse will continue to provide live coverage of MLB Arizona Diamondbacks games on channels 686-3 (satellite), 686 (via Internet), and 1782/782 (U-verse) to qualified customers.

KyL416

SatelliteGuys Pro

Jan 4, 2006

845

1,607

Tobyhanna, PA

Jul 18, 2023

#482

Pretty much all of the Diamondbacks territory is served by Centurylink, so I doubt U-Verse will have the DBACKS channel. U-Verse's only presence in Nevada is in the Reno DMA and they only get the A's and Giants.

Pretty much all of the Diamondbacks territory is served by Centurylink, so I doubt U-Verse will have the DBACKS channel. U-Verse's only presence in Nevada is in the Reno DMA and they only get the A's and Giants.

They’ll probably have it in the HD Premium Tier, which has many RSNs except for mostly their alternate feeds and some of the NBC Sports RSNs and Spectrum SportsNet

Jul 19, 2023

#499

In addition to the the previously mentioned MeetMax, targetted SPORTS offer updates and DBACKS channels going live, along with Bally Arizona Extra 2 being put into hidden/test mode:

More Wimbledon -> The Open changes, including the prep channels in the 9000s (9001->SMX, 9002->CINE144, 9003->CINE131, 9004->CINE142, 9005->CINE143, 9006->WNBC LIL, 9007->WNBC DNS, 9008->KNBC LIL, 9009->KNBC DNS, 9010->USA)

Subchannel relabels hit Yakima and Youngstown

KOPX's SD feed is live again

Cleaning up the remaining Nexstar INFO channel for Lafayette LA

KTEL/25 Carlsbad (Albuquerque) is now listed as independent after it switched from MeTV to Cozi and MeTV moved to KOB 4.3.

Playboy TV 2 is now pointing to logo_id 86, which used to be the previous Newsmax logo.

Passing along Gracenote's OTA RF number update for LA's KCOPDT3 (13.3 Movies! is now hosted by KNBC's RF 36 instead of KTTV's RF 11) and callsign updates for Charlotte's WHKY->WWJS
